data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: Kissflow - Cloud-based low code application development platform. Raised a total funding of $1.03M over 2 rounds from 83 investors. Valued at $8.02M. Kissflow has 340 competitors.

Kissflow - About the company

What does Kissflow do?

Cloud-based low code application development platform. The platform allows business users and IT developers to build enterprise applications. Some of the features of the platform include workflow automation, cases and project management, analytics, and reporting functionalities, cross functional collaboration, and more. It also provides a visual builder for designing forms. It is a tool available on the subscription based pricing model.

Which sectors and market segments does Kissflow operate in?

Kissflow serves in the B2B, SaaS space .

Kissflow's funding and investors

How much funding has Kissflow raised till date?

Kissflow has raised a total funding of $1.03M over 2 round s. Its first funding round was on Jan 06, 2012.

What are the most recent funding rounds of Kissflow?

Its latest funding round was a Seed round on Mar 29, 2012 for $1M. 72 investor s participated in its latest round, which includes Arbor Ventures, Fresco Global, Pragnya, Yukti Securities, Splice Capital, Atma Ram Properties, Prudent Advisors, Rajsthan Projects, Noumea Properties, Apollo Trading, Audasis Technosis Services, Lakshmi Narayanan, Sharad Sharma, Anand Ladsariya, Gopinath Padmanabhan, Laxman Narasimhan, Nitin Agarwal, Nitin Singhal, Rabi Kiran Sahoo, Revathy Ashok, Sanjai Vohra, Sundi Natarajan, Vijaya Kumar Ivaturi, Vikas Kuthiala, Vivek Raghavan, Yeshwanth Reddy, Amal Pramanik, Amitabh Shrivastava, Ashish Garodia, Bharat Odhavji Mehta, Dharminder Singh Sandhu, Ram Chaitanya Reddy Gunapati, Hema Ravindra, Jitendra Apte, Mohit Goyal, Nagaraja Parkasam, Rahul Basu, Raj Devireddy, Rajan Pandhare, Rajiv Mehta, Raman Roy, S Parthasarathy, Sanjay Bansal, Sanjay Bhasin, Shankar Maruwada, Sharad Junghare, Shealini Pandit, Sunil Kalra, Tejinderpal Miglani, Umesh Malhotra, Vikram Upadhyaya, Shead Holdings, Haystack Partners, Advance Computer Services, Hemant Kanakia, Manav Garg, Vikas Taneja, Linda Bernardi, Venkat S Raju, Ashok Khetan, Sadeesh Raghavan, Inderdeep Singh, Pramod Bhasin, Priyank Garg, Satya N Bansal, Chris Mathias, Piyush B Shah, Nilesh Shah, V P Rajesh, Heral Harish Mehta, Jigar Harish Mehta, Prachi Harish Mehta.

Who are Kissflow's investors?

Kissflow has 17 institutional investor s including Anicut Capital, Yukti Securities and Haystack Partners. Shead Holdings is the largest institutional investor in Kissflow . Ayee Goundan and 65 other s are Angel Investors in Kissflow .

Who is the current CEO of Kissflow?

Suresh Sambandam is the CEO of Kissflow .

Kissflow's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of Kissflow

Kissflow ranks 14 th among 340 competitors which include Airtable, Newgen and Pipefy. 58 of its competitors are funded while 17 have exited. Overall, Kissflow and its competitors have raised over $2.73B in funding across 138 funding rounds involving 533 investors. There are 3 private unicorns, 2 public and 15 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
